mapper.select: SELECT ec.id courseId, ec.title courseName, ec.lesson_num lessonNum, ec.cover cover, ec.price price, et.NAME teacherName, es.title parentSubjectName, es2.title childSubjectName FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es ON ec.parent_subject_id = es.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.child_subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId}
